Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/DNA Virus Infections/Herpesviridae Infections/Malignant Catarrh
Record.Description: A herpesvirus infection of cattle characterized by catarrhal inflammation of the upper respiratory and alimentary epithelia, keratoconjunctivitis, encephalitis and lymph node enlargement. Syn: bovine epitheliosis, snotsiekte.
